import "./App.css"; import portada from "./assets/lugo-04.webp"; import ReactWhatsapp from "react-whatsapp"; import { Popover, Image, Input } from "antd"; import { useState } from "react"; function App() { const text = Que deseas pedir?; const { TextArea } = Input; const [postData, setPostData] = useState({ waiter: "", message: "", }); const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false); const [visible1, setVisible1] = useState(false); const [visible2, setVisible2] = useState(false); const content = (
